Welcome to Space Data Scraper’s documentation!¶

The Space Data Scraper is an application that allows space enthusists, students, and professionals to visualize live and past solar space data. As a user you can create accounts for your own personal use, update your biography, follow other users, and upload some of your own data.

Here are links to the documentation of the modules found in the space-data-scraper directory:

Alerts - python file containing code for alerts feed

App - the python file containing the code for the space data scraper flask app

Data Fetcher - the file containing the code for fetching solar data

Follow Users - the file containing the code for following other users.

Forms - the file containing the code for registering, updating, and login in forms

Solar Flare - the file containing the code for solar flare data

Solar Weather - the file containing the code for fetching solar weather

Solar Weather Statistics - the file containing the code for compiling weather statistics
